mapper.select: SELECT L.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROWNUM AS RNUM, R.* FROM ( SELECT A.CODE_ID, B.CODE_ID_NM, A.CODE, A.CODE_NM, A.CODE_DC, A.USE_AT FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE A INNER JOIN LETTCCMMNCODE B ON A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID WHERE B.USE_AT = 'Y' AND B.CODE_ID = #{codeId} ORDER BY A.CODE_ID ASC, A.CODE ASC ) R ) L WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY RNUM ASC

SELECT C.CL_CODE as clCode, C.CL_CODE_NM as clCodeNm, B.CODE_ID as codeId, B.CODE_ID_NM as codeIdNm , A.CODE as code, A.CODE_NM as codeNm, A.CODE_DC as codeDc, A.USE_AT as useAt FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE A INNER JOIN LETTCCMMNCODE B ON A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID INNER JOIN LETTCCMMNCLCODE C ON B.CL_CODE = C.CL_CODE WHERE A.CODE_ID = #{value}
SELECT A.CODE as code, A.CODE_NM as codeNm, A.CODE_DC as codeDc, A.USE_AT as useAt FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE A WHERE A.CODE_ID = #{code}
SELECT A.CODE as code, A.CODE_NM as codeNm, A.CODE_DC as codeDc, A.USE_AT as useAt FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE A WHERE A.CODE = #{code}
mapper.update: UPDATE LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE SET CODE_NM = #{codeNm}, CODE_DC = #{codeDc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_AT = 'Y', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate WHERE CODE = #{code}
